import React from 'react' import '../Pages/styles.css' import '../App.css' require('dotenv').config(); const Confirmation = (props) => { var options = { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }; function backStep() { props.setFormStep(3); } return (

Thank you for your order!

Order Details

Date:

{props.selectedDay.toLocaleDateString('en-GB', options)}

Service:

{props.service}

Your Details

Name:

{props.user.name}

Phone:

{props.userPhone}

Address:

{props.userAddress}

{props.userNotes ? <>

Notes:

{props.userNotes}

: <> }
Home
) } export default Confirmation
